name:
Phoenix Wright™:
Ace Attorney™ – Dual Destinies
description:
Phoenix Wright™: Ace Attorney™ -
Dual Destinies sees the return of
courtroom hero Phoenix Wright. The
much loved gameplay and features
from previous titles in the Ace
Attorney™ series are back but for the
first time in stunning 3D graphics,
bringing the courtroom and characters
to life and putting players directly in
the heart of the action.


1. More courtroom drama as Apollo
Justice and new Associate Attorney
and psychoanalysis expert Athena
Sykes join Phoenix at the Wright
Anything Agency


2. Psychoanalyse witnesses to reveal
the truth with the brand new Mood
Matrix feature


3. Hold it! Present your evidence,
challenge the witnesses and
experience life as a real Attorney


4. Stunning dynamic 3D graphics:
bring the characters and courtroom to
life and investigate crime scenes from
various angles to uncover hidden
clues


5. Brand new interface and game
progression system for fans and
newcomers alike
